entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
